CustomField.description: Used to identify if campaign member has been synced with Pardot.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.pi__url__c)), HYPERLINK(Contact.pi__url__c, Contact.pi__url__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Lead.pi__url__c)),HYPERLINK(Lead.pi__url__c,Lead.pi__url__c), NULL))
CustomField.label: Pardot URL
